summary: In Italy, a woman fears her sister may have been kidnapped. Inspector Enzo Avolfi fears it's worse. They team up to rescue her from a sadistic killer known only as Yellow.
cast: Adrien Brody|Emmanuelle Seigner|Elsa Pataky|Robert Miano|Valentina Izumi|Sato Oi|Luis Molteni|Taiyo Yamanouchi|Daniela Fazzolari|Nicolò Morselli|Giuseppe Lo Console|Anna Varello|Franco Vercelli|Lorenzo Pedrotti|Farhad Re|Barbara Mautino|Silvia Spross|Cesare Scova|Lynn Swanson|Massimo Franceschi|Andrea Redavid|Alberto Onofrietti|Lorenzo Iacona|Giancarlo Judica Cordiglia|Salvatore Rizzo|Lorenzo Ceppodomo|Cristiana Maffucci|Liam Riccardo|Linda Messerklinger|Patrick Oldani|Claudio Coreno|Maryann McIver
keywords: body in a trunk|slasher flick|grindhouse film|torino|inspector
title: Giallo
